item.title: Slice & Dice
item.description:

Slice & Dice is a tactical dice battle roguelike.

Take control of 5 heroes, each with their own unique dice. Fight your way through 20 levels of monsters and try to take on the final boss. If you lose a single fight you have to start over so be careful/lucky!

Gameplay
- 3D dice physics, choose which dice to reroll
- Simple turn-based combat
- Level up a hero or gain an item after each fight
- Randomly-generated encounters
- Ridiculous combos
- Undo actions as much as you like
- Each turn is like a mini-puzzle

Features
- 128 hero classes (+99999?)

item.title: Alone in the Dark
item.description:
About This Game

Alone in the Dark weaves a chilling tapestry of psychological horror and Southern Gothic charm, reimagining the iconic game that set the benchmark for the genre. We invite you to join us on a journey into madness, where each encounter could be your last. With each step you take closer to unravelling Derceto's mystery, the eyes that watch from the darkness grow hungrier. Every bullet means the difference between survival and an unthinkable end. The next door you unlock could lead to a nightmarish realm offering nothing but slashing claws, grasping tentacles, and frayed sanity. Journey to interbellum Louisiana, where an era of decadence hides a darker tale - of escape from past traumas and an intolerant society, into the waiting grasp of something darker, something that has patiently lurked for impossible eons. This is Alone in the Dark as you've never seen it - a skillfully-woven narrative of Southern Gothic elegance and eldritch madness that pays homage to its legendary origins while taking the next step forward in survival horror storytelling.

A Haunting Tale of Mystery and Madness

Step inside Derceto Manor, an asylum shrouded in intrigue, guarding a terrible secret. Client Emily Hartwood and private investigator Edward Carnby embark on a harrowing quest for answers; Emily to the mystery of her missing uncle, Edward to the toughest case he will ever face, and both to questions they dare not ask themselves. This re-envisioned classic invites you to explore an unforgettable single player adventure rich with suspense, frights, and revelations that will test the limits of your imagination.

Featuring Hollywood Talent

Experience some of the greatest acting survival horror has ever seen through the performances of award-winning actors Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow) in their first videogame roles. Jodie and David‚Äôs immaculately captured likenesses breathe life into Emily Hartwood and Edward Carnby, lending a deeply personal aspect to Alone in the Dark‚Äôs story that demands it be played twice to get the full experience.

A Tribute to Horror Pioneers

Rediscover the essence of psychological horror in a game that respectfully nods to its 1992 origin, the game that established the survival horror genre. Alone in the Dark is your gateway to an experience steeped in the atmospheric dread of classic horror, with next-generation storytelling and gameplay. A must-play for fans of twisted tales, nerve-wracking exploration, and desperate combat.

A Story That Challenges Reality

Envisioned by Mikael Hedberg, acclaimed writer behind modern horror classics ‚ÄúSOMA‚Äù and ‚ÄúAmnesia‚Äù, Alone in the Dark‚Äôs intricate web of mystery delves into themes of trauma, faith, evil, and abandonment. Whether you choose to brave the nightmare as Emily or Edward, you will uncover secrets that defy everything you thought about videogame storytelling.



  • Explore Derceto Manor in this reimagination of Alone in the Dark, a love letter to the 90‚Äôs cult classic horror game.
  • Return to the roots of psychological horror and experience an atmospheric journey worthy of the game that started the genre.
  • Dive into a world full of sounds that make your skin crawl with a haunting, yet mesmerizing doom jazz soundtrack.
  • Enjoy the thrill of desperate survival in a world where reality starts to crumble, evil lurks in every shadow and ammunition is scarce.
  • Experience this nightmare from either Emily Hartwood‚Äôs or Edward Carnby‚Äôs perspective and unearth the dark secrets of a gothic mansion.
  • Immerse yourself in a deep psychological story that goes beyond the realms of the imaginable, by Mikael Hedberg, cult horror writer of SOMA and Amnesia.
  • See Emily and Edward brought to live by the Hollywood talent of Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow), who lend their voices, their appearance, and their formidable acting skills to the protagonists.

item.title: Raw Metal
item.description:
About This Game

Raw Metal is a sci-fi stealth-action dungeon crawler with a focus on smooth, stylish gameplay.

You are a lone scavenger on the distant, barren exoplanet Charybdis. In search of gear and supplies, you infiltrate the depths of Katabase 6, a massive mining facility run by a corrupt megacorporation known as Orpheus Tech. Sneak through the mines undetected, cleverly utilizing various gadgets and equipment to your advantage, but beware; if you're caught, you'll need to rely on your combat skills for a fighting chance to escape.

High-Stakes Stealth


Use taser darts, noisemakers, improvised concussion grenades, and more to slip past and isolate guards. The shadows are your domain; manipulate your environment and your enemies well enough and they'll never see you coming.

Breakneck Combat


Combat in Raw Metal is fast and punishing. The guards stationed at Katabase 6 are stronger and more heavily armored than you, so fighting them head on will take skill, cunning, and a great degree of risk. However, mastering combos and using your environment will allow you to come out on top, and yield far greater rewards. Depending on whether it is initiated through a clever ambush or a stealth slip-up, combat can range from a calculated risk to a desperate fight for survival.

Features


  • Blend of top-down stealth and third-person beat 'em up combat
  • Freeform combo system that rewards aggression, improvisation, and precise timing and positioning
  • 50+ unique gear pieces to find and upgrade
  • Distinct visuals for each gear piece to customize the look of your character
  • Risk vs. reward extraction system that grants you the choice of cashing out your loot, or pushing deeper into the facility
  • 3 memorable and challenging boss fights, each with their own fighting styles, twists, and story development
  • 9 hand-crafted levels to infiltrate, with a few variants each to mix up your approach each time
  • Environmental hazards and enemy variants to keep you on your toes as the game progresses
  • 5 deployable gadgets to utilize to your advantage in stealth and combat alike

item.title: Pesticide Not Required
item.description:
About This Game

Pesticide Not Required combines auto-attacking bullet heaven roguelites with farming game mechanics to create an expansive set of strategies and build combinations. Destroy huge hordes of evil insects, grow tons of crops, create your own build path, and unlock unique characters to play with!

Create Overpowered Builds


You are the bullet hell! Grow an arsenal of ridiculous weapons and craft your own unique build with a combination of 40+ stats. Additionally, each character has their own unique traits that keep runs fresh.

Farm, Fish, and Mine


Earn vital gold and experience from growing crops, catching fish, and mining. Expand your plot to harvest huge quantities of crops and build carefully to enhance your farming, fishing, and mining capabilities.

Automate Your Farm With Pets


Recruit friendly pets that will enhance your farm, collect loot, and kill enemies.

Other Features
  • Quick ~20-minute play sessions
  • Customizable home interior and backyard garden area
  • Season-themed map variations with 16 difficulty levels
  • 20+ unlockable characters with special traits
  • Persistent skill tree upgrades
  • 100+ achievements to unlock
  • Compendium with unique fish for each season
  • Mouse-only gameplay support
  • Gamepad and keyboard support
  • Go WUMBO!

Pesticide Not Required is inspired by awesome games like Brotato, Vampire Survivors, and Atomicrops.

item.title: Out of the Park Baseball 25
item.description:
About This Game


We are incredibly excited to announce Out of the Park Baseball 25 - the special 25th Anniversary edition of our award-winning baseball strategy series. Can you believe it's been a quarter of a century? Out of the Park Baseball is not just a game - it's a legacy.



If it happens in real baseball, it happens in Out of the Park Baseball! Discover new talent, draft the next superstar, negotiate with free agents, enter trade talks with other teams, build your dynasty and guide a franchise into an infinite future! As a manager, dive into the more hands-on management and set your team's lineups, pitching staffs, in-game strategy and call the shots from the dugout. You can oversee your league at a high level, or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered!

Here are just a few of the new features coming to Out of the Park Baseball 25:

A game-changing new Player Development Lab!

Shape the future of your upcoming stars! You can channel your inner Player Development Director like never before. A modern new Player Development Lab is here for every team that allows you to give players individual programs to work on, developing them how you like. Do you want your hitter to work on improving their baserunning? Bunting? Contact? Would you prefer your pitcher to work on building up their stamina? Developing a new pitch? Velocity? It's all up to you - for each of your upcoming future stars!

Massive Player Ratings and AI Upgrade!

It‚Äôs the most comprehensive player ratings upgrade in the 25 year history of Out of the Park Baseball! Batting, Pitching, and Fielding ratings have been painstakingly modified to capture the essence of baseball, with modifications to Contact and Power for hitters, Movement and Stuff for pitchers, the addition of Catcher Framing and Stealing Aggressiveness, and much more. BABIP is now front and center for hitters and hurlers, while new internal ratings updates allow for even more flexibility for Commissioners around the world to adjust the game to their detailed delight. Plus, the AI throughout the game has been improved dramatically to deliver the most challenging OOTP experience ever!

Even More Detailed Player Development Control!

Delegate how each and every player on your team will spend their time day in, day out with coaches at practice. Want your power hitter to worry less about avoiding strikeouts and put that time and effort into working on his home run swing instead? Want your aging starter to spend more time practicing his control instead of spending that time worrying about his stuff? By allocating their time and focus to the areas you want, over time you can influence how players develop, maintain their skillset, and fight the aging curve.

2024 Rosters and Rules!

As always, Out of the Park Baseball features up-to-the-minute 2024 MLB rosters that get updated all season long, with every franchise represented from its big league club all the way down to the low minors, and everywhere in between! Plus, OOTP 25 features officially licensed leagues from South Korea (KBO) and Europe.

Improved Historical MLB Modes!

Set up historical MLB games in an all new streamlined way - and benefit from vastly improved historical player ratings! It‚Äôs never been faster or easier to experience the entire history of Major League Baseball, now producing even more realistic outcomes thanks to those comprehensive ratings and simulation engine upgrades.

New Retro Visual Immersion!

Watch games with a variety of experiences, including retro-style black and white, ‚Äò50s-era, and ‚Äò70s-era television presentations. Choose from all of these to play games, watch highlights, or just catch a ballgame from a bygone era!

New Licensed Leagues!

For the first time ever, Out of the Park Baseball features an officially licensed Honkbal Hoofdklasse league from The Netherlands and the British Baseball Federation from the United Kingdom! Look for their official clubs, players, competitions, and more!

For the first time ever - an official partnership with the Baseball Hall of Fame!

What happens when you combine the only game that has the entire history of baseball and the the greatest Hall of Fame in sports? An incredible, year-long journey! Join us as we partner with the Baseball Hall of Fame all season - and beyond. Explore Hall of Fame Plaques, with the official, accurate text for each Hall of Famer. Discover incredible Hall of Fame artifacts, curated and released in fun "exhibits" over the course of the season in concert with the Hall - and more surprises too. It's going to be amazing!

Dozens of upgrades big and small!

--> Updated in-game engine base advancement and camera movements
--> A new manager decision history screen gives you a look back on your best and worst trades and transactions
--> Improved trade packages for prospect packages
--> Updated two-way functionality with injured players
And much more!



Perfect Team is back - bigger than ever!

It‚Äôs an all-new Perfect Team! There‚Äôs nothing in the world like the incredible online competitions of Perfect Team. Featuring by far the largest player pool ever, and taking advantage of all the player rating and balance upgrades, this year‚Äôs Perfect Team is a whole new ballgame.

Brand New Perfect Team Combinator Series Cards!

Pulled non-live cards have a chance to be a special Combinator Series version of the card! Use other cards that share a link (for example being teammates) with the player to get a chance to boost the raw ratings of the Combinator Series card.

A Perfect Team Tournament Roster Builder!

Want to design rosters for the incredible array of Perfect Team Tournaments - all on your own? For the first time ever, Perfect Team will feature a Tournament Sandbox! You can tinker to your heart's content with varying rosters for every type of tournament, with no pressure. This long-requested feature makes its debut in Out of the Park Baseball 25!

In addition to the brand-new Tournament Roster Builder and Combinator Series, Perfect Team 25 also features:

Team Chemistry - Players who played together in real life will get extra bonuses when on your roster together. Players gain bonuses for seasons they played together, as well as simply being part of the same team or from the same decades
Perfect Team competitions starting on the first day, including a huge Opening Weekend of Tournaments with big prizes and Perfect Team Championship Series qualifying from Day One!
New content all season long - and beyond! All new programs, missions, competitions, and excitement await you every day.

Out of the Park Baseball 25 runs on PC/Mac and features the American League and National League logos, the World Series trophy, official logos and jerseys for all 30 MLB teams and 15 KBO teams, over 150 Minor League Baseball league and team logos, and historical MLB logos.

item.title: Skelethrone: The Prey
item.description:

item.title: Toy Shire: Room One
item.description:
About This Game




Play through the three levels in Kevin's Room and defend your room against your old toys. Face Memphis-X in the final level and put a stop to his assault as he crushes your soldiers in an attempt to get to your base.



You received new toys from your family. Isn't that lovely? Oh, it's for sure...
Your old toys, though, aren't getting along as well. They are no longer cared for and have been forgotten. So what follows next? They're going to join together against you and assault your brand-new toys, so be prepared. But never worry! You're in luck since your brand-new toys are troops of green soldiers. They still require your aid though! Control, strengthen, and defeat the opposing forces! However, focus with care, the enemies you encounter might not be your old playthings!




Tower building alone won't be sufficient to repel incoming attackers. Build up your own troops in the best feasible positions, then unleash attacks into enemy territory. Never abandon your towers, and deploy your troops in accordance with the traits of the enemy. First, the attacking forces will attempt to get past your defenses. Build and improve towers to aid your army. By using unique abilities, you can support your troops and towers as well.




Safeguard your base against waves of attackers. You need to pick the right troops if you would like to prevail. Clean the paths and guard any open routes. Upgrade your troops and unlock new ones to take down the waves and claim victory.


Enter a world and a narrative built around the toys that enriched your youth, including toy soldiers, dinosaur sets, robots, building blocks, and more.

item.title: Dune: Imperium
item.description:
About This Game




Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

  • Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.
  • Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.
  • Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.
  • Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!


Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat‚Ä¶ or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.


In Dune: Imperium, you'll step into the role of one of the leaders of the Great Houses of the Imperium in a struggle to control the planet Arrakis and the invaluable Spice it provides.

The game plays out in a series of ten rounds, each of which is defined by a new Conflict on the surface of the planet; some award critical resources, and some provide Victory Points that will propel you to dominance. But choose your battles wisely: spread your forces too thin, and you'll find your enemies growing too strong to oppose.

Each round, you'll draw a hand of five cards from your deck, which will get stronger over the course of the game as you acquire new cards. Each card can be played in one of two ways: To send an Agent out into the Imperium to gather resources, or to Reveal at the end of the round to purchase new powerful cards. You must maintain a careful balance to get the most of the resources available to you. How will you find your path?

As your game progresses, you'll vie for Influence with four factions of the Imperium: The Emperor, the economically powerful Spacing Guild, the mysterious Bene Gesserit, and the ferocious Fremen of the deep deserts. Earning Influence among the various groups helps you to earn the Victory Points you need...but will you compete with your rivals for their favor, or abandon alliances to pursue other opportunities?

Many strategies are at your disposal, and many paths to victory. The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

item.title: Contra: Operation Galuga
item.description:
About This Game

A new entry in the legendary Contra series is here! Contra: Operation Galuga is a thorough reimagining of the classic run-'n'-gun action game from the '80s, featuring modern graphics and sound, new stages, new enemies and bosses, new play mechanics, an updated weapons system, and explosive co-op combat for up to two players in Story Mode or four players in Arcade Mode!

When the Red Falcon terrorist group takes over the Galuga Islands off the coast of New Zealand, elite Contra commandos Bill Rizer and Lance Bean springs into action, initiating an all-out war in which the fate of mankind hangs in the balance!

Run, jump, and shoot your way through eight levels using a devastating arsenal - including the spread shot, laser, and homing missiles - now with stackable upgrades and awesome Overload abilities! The intense action is customizable with three difficulty settings plus a variety of additional challenge options. The true Contra legacy begins now!

Key Features:
‚Ä¢The original run-'n'-gun game is back, reimagined and more action-packed than ever!
‚Ä¢Attack aggressively across eight explosive stages! Infiltrate the jungle, ascend the waterfall, speed through an enemy base on a hovercycle, and more!
‚Ä¢Multiple playable characters with distinct abilities!
‚Ä¢Epic, screen-filling boss battles!
‚Ä¢New and fan-favorite weapons, now with stackable upgrades and incredible Overload abilities!
‚Ä¢Multiple difficulty options and a wealth of extra content

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2 Character Creator & Storage

item.title: Command & Conquer Red Alert‚Ñ¢ 2 and Yuri‚Äôs Revenge‚Ñ¢

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Generals Zero Hour

Arsenal. Unleash the next generation of 3D new units and 20 new upgrades including China's ECM Tank, GLA's BattleBus and the USA's Spectre Gunship.

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Tiberian Sun‚Ñ¢ and Firestorm‚Ñ¢

About This Game

The Second Tiberium War begins in this legendary sequel to the original Command & Conquer.

With his forces stronger than ever, arch villain and leader of The Brotherhood of Nod - Kane - is pitched in an epic battle against the world's war machine - the Global Defense Initiative. Now you must orchestrate the fate of mankind.

item.title: Command & Conquer Renegade‚Ñ¢

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ Generals
item.description:
About This Game

item.title: Command & Conquer Red Alert‚Ñ¢, Counterstrike‚Ñ¢ and The Aftermath‚Ñ¢
item.description:

Command & Conquer: Red Alert gives you the opportunity to be more devious, cunning, and ruthless than ever before. Red Alert puts the fate of the world in your hands!

item.title: Command & Conquer‚Ñ¢ and The Covert Operations‚Ñ¢
item.description:

The legendary RTS game which started it all. Will you side with the humanistic GDI or bring the world to its knees with Kane and the Brotherhood of Nod. Your adversaries are without mercy. And so are you.

item.title: Rental

Great Deal!

item.title: A Difficult Game About Climbing
item.description:
About This Game

Use only your mouse (or gamepad) to control your climber's hands to pull yourself up an enormous, treacherous mountain full of challenges and surprises. Watch out for slippery surfaces as you make your way towards the peak. Eternal glory and a wonderful gift awaits all climbers who manage to reach the top!

Enjoy:

  • Punishing but not impossible gameplay. Practice makes perfect.
  • No filler, every obstacle is designed with intention.
  • Focused gameplay with no distracting elements.
  • No violence. You can never die or get hurt. But you can lose all your progress with one mistake... perhaps that is worse.
  • Climb, slip, fall. Over and over.
  • Endless suffering.

But not:

- Legs... You cannot use your legs for some reason.

Note from developer:

This game was created by one person, me (hello).This game is inspired by Getting Over it with Bennett Foddy which in itself is a homage to an even older game, Sexy Hiking by Jazzuo. I was certain that Bennett's game would spawn countless of new types of games in a similar fashion that would present unique, focused and yet simple challenges. I was disappointed to see that trend not materialize fully and so took it upon myself to make this game, hoping to contribute to the spirit of a "Foddian Type" game genre.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description:
About This Game

Red Barrels invites you to experience mind-numbing terror, this time with friends. Whether you go through the trials alone or in teams, if you survive long enough and complete the therapy, Murkoff will happily let you leave‚Ä¶ but will you be the same?

SYNOPSIS


Set in the era of the Cold War, human guinea pigs are involuntarily recruited by the good folks at the Murkoff Corporation to test advanced methods of brainwashing and mind control. In a world of distrust, fear, and violence, your morals will be challenged, your endurance tested, and your sanity crushed. All in the name of progress, science, and profit.

SURVIVE: SOLO OR COOP


You‚Äôre all prisoners of Murkoff trapped inside their facility. You can choose to complete the trials by yourself or you can tackle them in a team of 2, 3, or 4 players.
Coop is never forced when it comes to mandatory objectives but working together can be highly beneficial.
Whatever the number of players in your party, it‚Äôs about surviving and getting out.

Ultimately, your goal is to complete Murkoff's therapy and earn the right to be released back into society. In order to do so, you must complete the Trials and the MK-Challenges.
Trials are immersive story driven therapies that take a certain time to complete. Mk-Challenges are shorter therapies occurring in modified or redesigned section of an existing map.

HIDE OR FLIGHT


In pure Outlast fashion, the core gameplay involves avoiding enemies, hiding from them, and trying to run away. Murkoff will provide tools you can use to increase your stealth capabilities, create opportunities to flee, slow down enemies, and more. However, you will have to earn those tools and work hard to improve them.
The tools will allow you to
  • Stun enemies
  • Blind them
  • See through walls
  • Heal yourself and people around you.
Murkoff will ask you to perform disturbing tasks in each trials or mk-challenges. Only after completing those, will you be allowed to exit the Trials or the MK-Challenges.

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION


Customize and create your own trial patient.
Your cell is your home while you complete the therapy, you can decorate it however you wish.
Choose your tools, upgrades, and perks to fit your playstyle.
Meet the Denizens of Murkoff‚Äôs Sinyala Facility in The Outlast Trials. Each one of them will try and help you get through the Trials in one piece! Think you‚Äôll make it?


INVESTIGATE


You‚Äôve been abducted by the Murkoff Corporation to undergo unethical experiments that will modify your psyche and behavior throughout the Trials.
Collect documents and items that will help prove Murkoff‚Äôs malpractice against its patients.
The Process:
  • Break the Self: Murkoff aims to break down the test subject‚Äôs fundamental beliefs. Aspects of self-identity are systematically attacked. Like boot camp or indoctrination, the goal is to force a person to purge themselves of anything held sacred or taboo, the things that limit their behavior. The constant assault on identity, guilt and self-betrayal eventually leads to them breaking down.
  • Build the Self: It‚Äôs a bad cop, good cop principle. The rejection of the old ideology leaves a vacuum into which the new ideology can be introduced. As the antithesis of the old ideology, it forms a perfect attraction point as the person flees the old in search of a contrasting replacement. This progress is accelerated as the new ideology is portrayed as harmonious and ideally suited to the person's needs. Collegiality and calm replaces pain and punishment. Just at the point when the person is fearing annihilation of the self, they are offered a small kindness, a brief respite from the assault on their identity.
  • Salvation: Faced with the stark contrast of the pain of the past with the rosy glow of the future that the new ideology presents, the person sheds any the final allegiance to the old ideology, confessing any remaining deep secrets, and takes on the full mantle of the new ideology. This often feels, and has been described by many, as a form of rebirth. It may be accompanied by rites of passage as the person is accepted and cemented into the new order. The rituals will typically include strong statements made by the person about accepting the new ideology fully and completely, swearing allegiance to its leaders. Saluting flags, kissing other artefacts and other symbolic acts, all solemnly performed, all anchor them firmly in the new ground.


Content and Photosensitivity Warning:

The Outlast Trials contain strobing and flashing lights that could cause a small percentage of people to experience seizures when exposed to certain lights, patterns, or images.
This game also contains intense violence, gore, graphic sexual content, and strong language. Please enjoy.

item.title: Project RyME
item.description:
About This Game



Six months had passed since Mira's father disappeared and was presumed dead. The other day an old computer of his showed up mysteriously. It's unlike any computer she had seen before and convinced her the answer to his disappearance could be found on it. As the last person with any hope of her father's survival, she eagerly began investigating.



Project RyME is a puzzle adventure game where you investigate a strange, old computer to get to the bottom of Mira's father's disappearance. With the help of some interesting allies, use a variety of techniques to hack your way into systems that might have clues. Over the course of the investigation you'll experience at least a dozen different game genres.



  • Navigate a simulated desktop computer's windowing system

item.title: Clocked
item.description:
About This Game


The adventure takes place in a steampunk universe, within a Great Clock (thought as Big Ben), an unpretentious building where scientific activity takes place, as part of research into new energy sources... or so the story goes.
You take on the role of an automaton, limited to moving, running and interacting, accompanied by a calculator-being that will stick with you until the end of the adventure.
The building is labyrinthine, forcing you to make numerous trips back and forth in order to progress through the story, a classic piece of architecture.

The adventure is meant to be short, but it will take longer to uncover all that Clocked hides.

You'll have to use your dexterity to avoid the symbiotic clusters that will surprise you during your health walk.
This is an important dimension, as it will give you access to areas that are normally inaccessible...think about it!

Don't forget to chat with your calculator friend, he's very chatty.

item.title: Slice & Dice
item.description:

Slice & Dice is a tactical dice battle roguelike.

item.title: Alone in the Dark
item.description:
About This Game

Alone in the Dark weaves a chilling tapestry of psychological horror and Southern Gothic charm, reimagining the iconic game that set the benchmark for the genre. We invite you to join us on a journey into madness, where each encounter could be your last. With each step you take closer to unravelling Derceto's mystery, the eyes that watch from the darkness grow hungrier. Every bullet means the difference between survival and an unthinkable end. The next door you unlock could lead to a nightmarish realm offering nothing but slashing claws, grasping tentacles, and frayed sanity. Journey to interbellum Louisiana, where an era of decadence hides a darker tale - of escape from past traumas and an intolerant society, into the waiting grasp of something darker, something that has patiently lurked for impossible eons. This is Alone in the Dark as you've never seen it - a skillfully-woven narrative of Southern Gothic elegance and eldritch madness that pays homage to its legendary origins while taking the next step forward in survival horror storytelling.

A Haunting Tale of Mystery and Madness

Step inside Derceto Manor, an asylum shrouded in intrigue, guarding a terrible secret. Client Emily Hartwood and private investigator Edward Carnby embark on a harrowing quest for answers; Emily to the mystery of her missing uncle, Edward to the toughest case he will ever face, and both to questions they dare not ask themselves. This re-envisioned classic invites you to explore an unforgettable single player adventure rich with suspense, frights, and revelations that will test the limits of your imagination.

Featuring Hollywood Talent

Experience some of the greatest acting survival horror has ever seen through the performances of award-winning actors Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow) in their first videogame roles. Jodie and David‚Äôs immaculately captured likenesses breathe life into Emily Hartwood and Edward Carnby, lending a deeply personal aspect to Alone in the Dark‚Äôs story that demands it be played twice to get the full experience.

A Tribute to Horror Pioneers

Rediscover the essence of psychological horror in a game that respectfully nods to its 1992 origin, the game that established the survival horror genre. Alone in the Dark is your gateway to an experience steeped in the atmospheric dread of classic horror, with next-generation storytelling and gameplay. A must-play for fans of twisted tales, nerve-wracking exploration, and desperate combat.

A Story That Challenges Reality

Envisioned by Mikael Hedberg, acclaimed writer behind modern horror classics ‚ÄúSOMA‚Äù and ‚ÄúAmnesia‚Äù, Alone in the Dark‚Äôs intricate web of mystery delves into themes of trauma, faith, evil, and abandonment. Whether you choose to brave the nightmare as Emily or Edward, you will uncover secrets that defy everything you thought about videogame storytelling.



  • Explore Derceto Manor in this reimagination of Alone in the Dark, a love letter to the 90‚Äôs cult classic horror game.
  • Return to the roots of psychological horror and experience an atmospheric journey worthy of the game that started the genre.
  • Dive into a world full of sounds that make your skin crawl with a haunting, yet mesmerizing doom jazz soundtrack.
  • Enjoy the thrill of desperate survival in a world where reality starts to crumble, evil lurks in every shadow and ammunition is scarce.
  • Experience this nightmare from either Emily Hartwood‚Äôs or Edward Carnby‚Äôs perspective and unearth the dark secrets of a gothic mansion.
  • Immerse yourself in a deep psychological story that goes beyond the realms of the imaginable, by Mikael Hedberg, cult horror writer of SOMA and Amnesia.
  • See Emily and Edward brought to live by the Hollywood talent of Jodie Comer (Killing Eve, Free Guy) and David Harbour (Stranger Things, Black Widow), who lend their voices, their appearance, and their formidable acting skills to the protagonists.

item.title: Hangul Shooter
item.description:

item.title: Super Math Saga
item.description:
About This Game

Super Math Saga is an educational platformer game that combines adventure and math. Work your way through levels dodging enemies, climbing platforms, and solving math questions. item.title: Master Maker 3D Ultimate
item.description:
About This Game

Clear retro 3D levels or build your own in this 3D action platformer for all ages!

  • Create new original stages by placing blocks, coins, traps, enemies and more!
  • Unlock hundreds of bonus levels for extended replay value.
  • Enjoy low-poly style inspired by genre classics of the ‚Äô90s!

item.title: Froggo's Adventure: Verdant Venture
item.description:
About This Game

A Simple and Bite-sized retro 2D Platformer about a frog on another side-scrolling adventure.

  • Stylized aesthetics heavily inspired by retro games from the early 90s

item.title: Decypher
item.description:
About This Game

Decypher offers a thrilling experience of deciphering hidden codes. Alongside the standard rule, the game introduces an array of exciting variants and a wide range of levels to keep you engaged.

Features

item.title: John's Hell
item.description:
About This Game

Description

item.title: We Are SUP
item.description:
About This Game

A simple bra-fighting game that only uses addition! Dive into dungeons and defeat monsters in online play!

Strengthen your weapons to defeat monsters in dungeons!

Game Description

"We Are SUP" is a bluff-style board game where supporters defeat monsters in dungeons.
The only way for weak supporters to survive is to defeat monsters in one blow!
Players play buff cards from their dealt hands one by one on the field to accumulate attack power.

item.title: Firespike
item.description:
About This Game

Firespike is an wave survival game with minimalistic gameplay and rogelite elements.

The grass fields are empty. Suddenly, out of the ground a skeleton digs its way up. More Skeletons follow, till a whole horde comes up. There is no way to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as possible till death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

You play a Rifleman and fight in an endless Wave survival. The enemies are skeletons. Your Health bar wont regenerate, so you need to watch out for every hit. The Waves build up progressively, in wave 1 there is 1 unit, in wave 2 there are 2 units, and so on and so forth. So the first few waves gonna be easy, but by wave 10 its starting to get tricky. If your health bar goes to zero, you start by wave 1 again with full health. The Wave that you are currently playing is your score, the higher the wave the higher is you score. The game has a retro look, where you play on a grass field and fight skeletons. If you defeat all enemies the next wave will spawn immediately, there is no time pressure, the next wave will spawn only after you finished the current wave.

Units:
- Skeleton Mage: makes ranged attacks that you need to dodge, moves in random directions. Shoots fireballs.
- Skeleton Warrior: attacks you if you get to close, moves in random directions.
- Skeleton Elite: will chase after you, makes a lot of damage if he is in range and takes a lot of hits to defeat.
- Skeleton Dog: is the fastest unit in the game and also the most annoying. Will chase after you and takes a few hits to defeat. You are forced to run away from the skeleton dogs and try to hit them while you run.

The Keyboard Controls are displayed in the Game Menu.

Features:
- Infinite Waves to play.
- Difficulty gets progressively more difficulty with every wave.
- No Health regeneration.
- Ranged attacks with a bullet.
- Animated Units.
- Supports Mouse and Keyboard.

version 1.0

item.title: Prometheus Unbound
item.description:
About This Game

As an amalgamation of leftover memories from a dead brain and an AI implant, Anala Piers is neither human nor machine. But, is she something more or something less? Suddenly conscious in a world that does not want her and a body that does not belong to her, Anala does the only thing she can think to do: she demands answers.

Prometheus Unbound is a 2D stealth platformer with graceful speed and machine-precision movement. Gameplay includes fast paced parkour movement and jumps, as well as stealth mechanics like sneaking, hiding, and wall sticking. Each stage is timed, allowing players to re-attempt levels for faster times, or even to challenge the clear times the developers set! In addition to main story levels, there are five challenge levels where players can test their platforming and parkouring abilities to the limits. In addition, many levels are open to explore in multiple ways, allowing the player to find hidden collectibles and other areas.

item.title: DOS - Steve Pardo
item.description:
About This Game

Introducing DOS (pronounced ‚Äúdoss‚Äù), the album, which composer for games, audio designer, and saxophonist Steve Pardo has also developed into an isometric music-driven platformer game.

DOS, the album, is instrumental and cinematic in nature, rooted in the jazz tradition, and consisting of influences spanning indie rock, electronic music, ambient, and classical musics. It is patient, evolving, melodic, and curious. It consists of seven songs written by game composer Steve Pardo during a season of his and his family‚Äôs move from Boston to Nashville, being a season of change and with a spirit of adventure and hope.

DOS, the game, is a single-player, beat-based platformer, with a bit of puzzle solving, adventure game mechanics, and a subtle narrative. You play as a cube with eyes that blink, where every song on the album is presented as a level of the game. It is a story told as an adventure, simple enough for anyone to pick up and play, with just a touch of reactive challenges along the way, letting the music take center-stage.

DOS is the debut project to be released by the indie game development studio The Pardo Brothers, which was co-founded by Steve and Jonathan Pardo. Steve Pardo performs on woodwinds, guitars, keys, synths, and FX, as well as Mike Baggetta on electric guitar and FX, Jon Estes on guitars and bass, and Brian Fitch on drums. Special guests include Liz Estes on violin, and Amy Pardo on flute.

item.title: Cybergrid Runner

item.title: Joe Dungeon
item.description:

Joe Dungeon is a game about managing decisions of risk and reward. The user will have to calculate aspects such as time, distance, enemies, cards, and more when deciding a path. item.title: CruxFlaw
item.description:

Throw, Slash, Dash! Cruxflaw is an arena score attack game in which you have to manage your use of your stun orb to effectively to survive as long as possible. Manage your resources by throwing it to stun enemies, then predict where it will travel to pick it up and refresh your dashes.

item.title: Dark Mirror
item.description:

story

item.title: GEARS STORY

item.title: Deep in the Woods

item.title: Hues

item.title: LEAD - Rally

item.title: Raw Metal
item.description:
About This Game

You are a lone scavenger on the distant, barren exoplanet Charybdis. In search of gear and supplies, you infiltrate the depths of Katabase 6, a massive mining facility run by a corrupt megacorporation known as Orpheus Tech. High-Stakes Stealth

Features


  • Blend of top-down stealth and third-person beat 'em up combat
  • Freeform combo system that rewards aggression, improvisation, and precise timing and positioning
  • 50+ unique gear pieces to find and upgrade
  • Distinct visuals for each gear piece to customize the look of your character
  • Risk vs. reward extraction system that grants you the choice of cashing out your loot, or pushing deeper into the facility
  • 3 memorable and challenging boss fights, each with their own fighting styles, twists, and story development
  • 9 hand-crafted levels to infiltrate, with a few variants each to mix up your approach each time
  • Environmental hazards and enemy variants to keep you on your toes as the game progresses
  • 5 deployable gadgets to utilize to your advantage in stealth and combat alike

item.title: Five Nights With Los Penguinos
item.description:
About This Game

You are an ordinary security guard working in an unloved and low-paid job. Therefore, when you were offered a substantial sum for a simple job, it was impossible to resist the temptation.

Now you have to guard an object where something strange is happening. But what awaits you there? Feel like a security guard in the game Five Nights With Los Pinguinos.

This is a mindfulness game where you have to defend yourself from penguins by watching CCTV cameras and closing doors in the passage between locations. Be on your guard against the characters, because they will do everything so that you do not live until the morning, so you will have to put a lot of effort and time!

Try to control the penguins throughout the shift! Interact with the game to get an unforgettable experience. The map consists of several rooms, each of them belongs to certain themes that embody the character of penguins.

item.title: Bricks Breaker Pro
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an exciting journey for the whole family with Brick Breaker Pro! This beloved classic breakout game is not just about breaking bricks - it's a fun-filled adventure suitable for all ages. Get ready for hours of entertainment in a vibrant world bursting with color and excitement.

Brick Breaker Pro offers a simple yet addictive gameplay experience that everyone can enjoy. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just starting out, you'll find yourself immersed in the action-packed fun. Aim, shoot, and watch as the bricks crumble before your eyes, earning points and unlocking new challenges along the way.

And that's not all - Brick Breaker Pro is constantly evolving with new features and updates. Soon, we'll be adding an incredible 5000 achievements to keep you motivated and engaged like never before. So gather the family, unleash your inner brick-breaking champion, and let the adventure begin!

item.title: Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place
item.description:
About This Game


This game is a Horror Fiction Adventure (60-90 minutes). Perfect to play right before bed!

In tonight's episode of Midnight Scenes, Phil‚Äôs existence is threatened by his oppressive home environment, intransigent parents, and terrible nightmares that push his sanity close to the precipice.

In this dark tale exploring themes of isolation and loneliness, our protagonist confronts terrifying truths buried deep inside him. Will he survive the test?

Turn off the lights and enter the depths of Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place.

This is the fifth in a series of short horror tales with adventure elements by Octavi Navarro, creator of the critically acclaimed games The Supper, The Librarian, and Uninvited, and artist on Thimbleweed Park and Photographs.




  • Enjoy this exciting and intense tale through the eyes of Phil, a young man tormented by horrible nightmares.
  • A Horror Fiction Adventure that will take you to unsuspected limits.
  • Explore, interact with your surroundings...and face your fears.
  • Colorful pixel art inspired by horror and mystery classics like The Twilight Zone and The Outer Limits.
  • Spooky and dark original soundtrack.
  • Atmospheric sound effects.

Will you find your safe place?

item.title: Xenoterrestrial
item.description:
About This Game

XENOTERRESTRIAL is a game about a man whose xenophobia is not so much earthly as it about extraterrestrials. Different type of alien I guess.

This top-down technical shooter, in the spirit of games like Hotline Miami and Ultrakill combines skill with strategy for a fast paced, challenging experience. A combination of a wealth of complex yet easy to learn mechanics and a great deal of customization make this an absolute must play for fans of technical shooters.

Features include:

7 Weapons to Use in Tandem
Extensive customization (5 mods available for each weapon)
Several other cooldown-based mechanics (gear collected by the player)
A central narrative
A complex and diverse set of enemies
5 different difficulties for players of all ability (or those who are just looking for a different experience)
Performance related settings adjustments
Complex, technical mechanics reminiscent of games like Ultrakill and Doom
Secret levels and skins
Rewarding rank and leveling systems that encourage both progression and replayability
A style points system
An original soundtrack
And so much more!

What does the game include right now?
At present, Xenoterrestrial includes only one chapter worth of levels (8 plus a secret level). I will continue to update the game, adding the rest of the chapters, along with much more such as bonus content, and (maybe eventually) even multiplayer.

item.title: The Liminal Space
item.description:
About This Game

"The Liminal Space" is a thrilling horror adventure game. Dive into surreal landscapes, solve intriguing puzzles, and evade terrifying creatures that inhabit the world. Beware, physical monsters lurk within the game. Make sure to stealthily avoid them as attracting their attention can land you in serious trouble! Your primary goal is to swiftly locate the exit and escape from this ghostly place unless you find this eerie environment enticing for living. So, are you prepared for the exciting and chilling challenges this game presents? Enter "The Liminal Space" now and explore the sheer thrill of the unexpected!

item.title: 2x4 Nails
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Hell City, USA, where a new drug called "Pig" turns homeless addicts into violent maniacs. A serial killer known to the press as "Der Kannibale" has been butchering and feasting on its victims while leaving Bavarian clues at every crime scene, like German Oktoberfest beer. The FBI is on the scene to hunt down the cannibal, while local police are helpless and overwhelmed by the increasing brutality of psychotic vagrants.

As FBI Field Photographer Thomas Greene, you do not carry a gun and need whatever weapon you can find to stay alive and get the job done. Grab a two-by-four, pipe, fire axe, shovel, brick, beer bottle, or whatever you can from the environment around you. Document every crime scene with your camera to solve the murders and fight the addicted and deranged.

MELEE COMBAT

  • Visceral first-person melee combat! Fight back the horrors that can lurk behind every corner!
  • A variety of improvised melee weapons can be pried from the interactive environment, like a 2x4 with nails, a toilet seat, a water pipe, rebar, bricks, and many more.
  • A powerful taser to neutralize attackers. Stun your enemies and gain the edge in combat!

CAMERA

  • Your main assignment is to document the violent crimes committed by "Der Kannibale" with your field camera. Corpses are usually mutilated, beheaded, and gutted. Take the perfect shot at the right angle and get the job done.
  • Enter the correct field journal entries to get a good rating in your investigations.

CRIME SCENES
  • Explore the streets and abandoned buildings in Hell City and make your way to the different interconnected parts of the crime scene sealed off by the local police.
  • Meaningful conversations with police officers and drug dealers. Befriending NPCs will open up more opportunities in your future investigations.

item.title: Stray Shot
item.description:
About This Game

This is a unique twin-stick arena shooter where your own actions define the difficulty. Shoot recklessly at the walls and you will drown in enemies, but shoot too little and you will have a mediocre score. Observe the different monsters's behaviours and be strategic in the way you fight them. The more monsters there are in the arena, the more points you get for each one defeated.

Unlock and play in 8 different arenas with their unique monsters, take on contract levels to defeat specific sets of monsters, unlock clan levels for monsters you've seen on each of their 5 evolutions, take on seeded daily challenges which keep throwing new sets of monsters at you until you die, or play the gauntlet mode where you win coins and shop for upgrades that will last you until you run out of lives!

The game plays either with mouse and keyboard, or with a game controller. You can play singleplayer or co-op with 2 to 4 players. A play session can take anywhere between 5 minutes and multiple hours depending on the game modes you take on and how fast you tire out! Perfect for both coffee breaks and extended play sessions!

Features a banging original soundtrack by Pentadrangle!

item.title: Serafina's Saga: Awakened
item.description:
About This Game


Young Serafina has spent her entire life alone in the jungle with only her guardian, a mysterious man named Arken, as company. When Arken is captured by a group of soldiers and carried away, Serafina must venture outside the forest to save him. On her journey to the heart of the kingdom, Serafina discovers a whole new world beyond the shadows of the jungle.

From the depths of the jungle to the bustling Castle of Krondolee, you must decide for yourself who to trust. Your decision will help Serafina uncover the truth of her past, rescue Arken, and possibly save the kingdom.


Start by befriending your possible companions, then choose a partner for romance and a unique story branch. Perhaps you'll choose the strong and stoic Jezu, playful Nikolaos, chaotic Valerie, or the scheming and salacious Reuben.



  • A complete remake of the original "Serafina's Saga" adventure
  • Choose between four distinct romances and story paths
  • Listen to a rich cast of English voice actors in select scenes
  • Enjoy a lush 3D environment developed in UE4
  • Hear a lengthy, dynamic soundtrack remixed and expanded from original game
